page.title: 20SCHOOLS
page.content:
{(CONTINUED FROM P.19) { }Where a form has one teacher, the time spent on a particular subject is more flexible. English, Maths, History, Music, P.E. and Art are taught in all 3 schools. The two private schools put emphasis on languages and adopt a more formal style, whereas Langton Primary does more project work. Knowle Court also spends time on Drama while Holmewood spends a lot of time on sport.
* * * * * * * * * *
The pages about this area were written by:
Forms U6 and U6A from Holmewood House. Forms 5 and 6 from Knowle Court. 3rd year juniors from Langton Primary.
